trans-unit.source: An abstract class used as a base class for other formatters, (for example <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10FeedFormatter" />).
trans-unit.target: Classe astratta utilizzata come classe base per altri formattatori, ad esempio <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10FeedFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: This class is abstract and cannot be instantiated directly.
trans-unit.target: La classe è astratta e non è possibile creare direttamente un'istanza.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> to write.
trans-unit.target: Valore <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> da scrivere.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter" /> con l'istanza di <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> specificata.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter> must have a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Un formattatore <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter> deve avere un elemento <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> associato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter> can then write out the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter> può quindi scrivere <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> in un <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.

trans-unit.source: The only way to associate a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter> is by using this constructor.
trans-unit.target: L'utilizzo di questo costruttore rappresenta l'unico modo in cui associare un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> a un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter>.

trans-unit.source: An XML reader to check.
trans-unit.target: Lettore XML da controllare.

trans-unit.source: Verifies whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> contains a valid syndication feed.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se la classe <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> specificata contiene un feed di diffusione valido.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the XML reader contains a valid syndication feed, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, se il lettore XML contiene un feed di diffusione valido, in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This method verifies whether the start element name and namespace match the start element name and namespace of the RSS 2.0 or Atom 1.0 specification.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo verifica se il nome e lo spazio dei nomi dell'elemento iniziale corrispondono al nome e allo spazio dei nomi dell'elemento iniziale delle specifiche RSS 2.0 o Atom 1.0.

trans-unit.source: Associates a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> instance with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is protected and cannot be called from user code.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo è protetto e non può essere chiamato da codice utente.

trans-unit.source: To associate a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> instance with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter>, either create a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter> instance and pass the constructor a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> instance or load a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> instance into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter> by calling the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter.ReadFrom%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.
trans-unit.target: Per associare un'istanza di <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter>, creare una nuova istanza di <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter> e passare un'istanza di <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> al costruttore oppure caricare un'istanza di <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> in <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter> mediante la chiamata al metodo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter.ReadFrom%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29>.
